name: Bumble Breeze
description:
Goal:

Collect pollen like a good bumblebee. You are harvesting pollen in a garden full of meditating monks. Their breathing rythm impacts your flightability.

Controls:

Tap WASD/Arrow Buttons to fly the bumblebee

Instructions:

Collect pollen from the air and from the flowers by staying on them.Pollen make you heavier - better spend it in the store on new abilities.The monks breath pushes you up and down. Be careful not to get eaten.|
